posts.post_content:
I'm looking for three cards in particular, preferably in a condition I can afford (i.e. Vgish or less, although I may spring for higher):

Good Play at Third (Cobb, Moriarity)
Knight Catches a Runner (Knight, Johnson)
Lobert Almost Caught (Kling, Young)

Let me know what you've got.  If you want to trade, include your wants...

Take Care,
Geno
